title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 421.7 - Termination of parental rights
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 421.7 - Termination of parental rights

State Regulations

When adoption would be in the best interests of a child
and a surrendering instrument has not been executed, an authorized agency shall
petition the court to terminate parental rights under the provisions of section
384-b
of
the Social Services Law, including the parental rights of the biological father
of an out-of-wedlock child when his consent to an adoption would be required
pursuant to section
111
(1)(e)
of the Domestic Relations

Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
421.7

Amended

New

York State Register December 23, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 51, eff. 12/23/2015

Amended

New

York State Register November 8, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 45, eff. 11/8/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
